trans-unit.source: Displays ADO.NET data in a scrollable grid.
trans-unit.target: Viser ADO.NET data i et rullbare rutenett.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control replaces and adds functionality to the DataGrid control; however, the DataGrid control is retained for both backward compatibility and future use, if you choose.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> kontrollen erstatter og legger til funksjoner i DataGrid-kontrollen; imidlertid DataGrid-kontrollen er beholdt for bakoverkompatibilitet og fremtidig bruk hvis du velger.

trans-unit.source: The DataGrid displays Web-like links to child tables.
trans-unit.target: DataGrid viser Web-lignende koblinger til underordnede tabeller.

trans-unit.source: You can click on a link to navigate to the child table.
trans-unit.target: Du kan klikke en kobling til å navigere til den underordnede tabellen.

trans-unit.source: When a child table is displayed, a back button appears in the caption that can be clicked to navigate back to the parent table.
trans-unit.target: Når en underordnet tabell som vises, vises en tilbakeknappen i teksten kan aktiveres for å gå tilbake til den overordnede tabellen.

trans-unit.source: The data from the parent rows is displayed below the caption and above the column headers.
trans-unit.target: Data fra de overordnede radene vises under teksten og over kolonneoverskriftene.

trans-unit.source: You can hide the parent row information by clicking the button to the right of the back button.
trans-unit.target: Du kan skjule overordnede rad informasjon ved å klikke knappen til høyre for tilbakeknappen.

trans-unit.source: To display a table in the DataGrid at run time, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.SetDataBinding%2A> method to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A> properties to a valid data source.
trans-unit.target: For å vise en tabell i DataGrid ved kjøretid, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.SetDataBinding%2A>metode for å angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A>egenskapene til en gyldig datakilde.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.SetDataBinding%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following data sources are valid: - A <xref:System.Data.DataTable> - A <xref:System.Data.DataView> - A <xref:System.Data.DataSet> - A <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> - A single dimension array - Any component that implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> interface - Any component that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface For more information about the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> class, see [DataSets, DataTables, and DataViews](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Følgende datakilder er gyldige: – en <xref:System.Data.DataTable>– en <xref:System.Data.DataView>– en <xref:System.Data.DataSet>– en <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager>- en endimensjonal matrise - komponent som implementerer den <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>interface - komponent som implementerer den <xref:System.Collections.IList>grensesnitt For mer informasjon om den <xref:System.Data.DataSet>klasse, kan du se [datasett, DataTables og DataViews](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Collections.IList> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> </xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> </xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.DataView> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: You can create a grid that enables users to edit data but prevents them from adding new rows by using a <xref:System.Data.DataView> as the data source and setting the <xref:System.Data.DataView.AllowNew%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Du kan opprette et rutenett som gjør at brukere redigerer data, men ikke kan legges til nye rader ved hjelp av en <xref:System.Data.DataView>som datakilde og innstillingen det <xref:System.Data.DataView.AllowNew%2A>egenskapen `false`.</xref:System.Data.DataView.AllowNew%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataView>

trans-unit.source: Data sources are further managed by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> objects.
trans-unit.target: Datakilder som mer administreres av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>objekter.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>

trans-unit.source: For each table in a data source, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> can be returned from the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>.
trans-unit.target: For hver tabell i en datakilde, en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>kan returneres fra skjemaet <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can determine the number of rows contained by a data source by returning the associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> object's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Count%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel bestemme antall rader av en datakilde ved å returnere den tilknyttede <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>objektets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Count%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Count%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>

trans-unit.source: To validate data, use the underlying objects that represent data and their events.
trans-unit.target: For å validere data, kan du bruke de underliggende objektene som representerer data og deres hendelser.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the data comes from a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> in a <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, use the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.ColumnChanging> and <xref:System.Data.DataTable.RowChanging> events.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis dataene kommer fra en <xref:System.Data.DataTable>i en <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, bruk av <xref:System.Data.DataTable.ColumnChanging>og <xref:System.Data.DataTable.RowChanging>hendelser.</xref:System.Data.DataTable.RowChanging> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.ColumnChanging> </xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Because the number of columns can be customized (by adding or deleting members of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>) and the rows can be sorted by column, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.RowNumber%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.ColumnNumber%2A> property values cannot be guaranteed to correspond to <xref:System.Data.DataRow> and <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> indexes in a <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Fordi antallet kolonner som kan tilpasses (ved å legge til eller slette medlemmer av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>) og radene kan sorteres etter kolonne til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.RowNumber%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.ColumnNumber%2A>kan ikke garanteres egenskapsverdier tilsvare <xref:System.Data.DataRow>og <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>indekserer i <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn> </xref:System.Data.DataRow> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.ColumnNumber%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.RowNumber%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>

trans-unit.source: Therefore you should avoid using those properties in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating> event to validate data.
trans-unit.target: Du bør derfor ikke bruke disse egenskapene i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating>-hendelsen for å validere data.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating>

trans-unit.source: To determine which cell is selected, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil finne ut hvilken celle velges, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A>

trans-unit.source: Change the value of any cell by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.Item%2A> property, which can take either the row and column indexes of the cell, or a single <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell>.
trans-unit.target: Endre verdien for en celle ved hjelp av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.Item%2A>egenskapen, og det kan ta rad- og indekser, eller én <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: Monitor the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCellChanged> event to detect when the user selects another cell.
trans-unit.target: Overvåking av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCellChanged>for å finne når brukeren velger en annen celle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCellChanged>

trans-unit.source: To determine which part of the control the user clicked, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTest%2A> method in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil finne ut hvilken del av kontrollen brukeren klikket, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTest%2A>metoden i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTest%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTest%2A> method returns a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestInfo> object, which contains the row and column of a clicked area.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTest%2A>metoden returnerer en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestInfo>-objektet som inneholder raden og kolonnen i et klikket område.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestInfo> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTest%2A>

trans-unit.source: To manage the appearance of the control at run time, several properties for setting the color and caption attributes are available, including the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CaptionForeColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CaptionBackColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CaptionFont%2A>, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil administrere utseendet til kontrollen ved kjøretid, flere egenskaper for å angi farge og teksten attributtene som er tilgjengelige, inkludert de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CaptionForeColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CaptionBackColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CaptionFont%2A>og så videre.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CaptionFont%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CaptionBackColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CaptionForeColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The appearance of the displayed grid (or grids) can be further modified by creating <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> objects and adding them to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>, which is accessed through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Utseendet til vises rutenett (eller rutenett) videre kan endres ved å opprette <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>objekter og legge dem til i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>, som er tilgjengelig via den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A> is set to a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> containing three <xref:System.Data.DataTable> objects, you can add three <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> objects to the collection, one for each table.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>er satt til en <xref:System.Data.DataSet>som inneholder tre <xref:System.Data.DataTable>objekter, kan du legge til tre <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>objekter i samlingen, én for hver tabell.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: To synchronize each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> object with a <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> to the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> of the <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: Synkroniserer hvert <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>objekt med en <xref:System.Data.DataTable>Sett den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>til den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>til den <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A>av <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>

trans-unit.source: For more information about binding to an array of objects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om binding til en matrise av objekter, se den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To create a customized view of a table, create an instance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn> class and add the object to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection> accessed through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil opprette en tilpasset visning av en tabell, kan du opprette en forekomst av en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn>klasse og legge til objektet i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>tilgjengelig via den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn>

trans-unit.source: Both classes inherit from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>.
trans-unit.target: Begge klasser arve fra <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: For each column style, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A> to the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A> of a column that you want to show in the grid.
trans-unit.target: For hver kolonne mal angitt i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A>til den <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A>for en kolonne du vil vise i rutenettet.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A>

trans-unit.source: To hide a column, set its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A> to something other than a valid <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil skjule en kolonne, Sett den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A>til noe annet enn en gyldig <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A>.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A>

trans-unit.source: To format the text of a column, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> to one of the values found in [Formatting Types](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil formatere teksten i en kolonne, angitt i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A>for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn>til en av verdiene [formateringstyper](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) og [egendefinert dato og klokkeslett-formatstrenger](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A>

trans-unit.source: To bind the DataGrid to a strongly typed array of objects, the object type must contain public properties.
trans-unit.target: Objekttypen må inneholde felles egenskaper for å binde DataGrid til forespørselsparameter av sterk type matrise av objekter.

trans-unit.source: To create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> that displays the array, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `typename[]` where `typename` is replaced by the name of the object type.
trans-unit.target: Opprette en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>som viser matrisen må du angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen `typename[]` der `typename` erstattes med navnet objekttypen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>

trans-unit.source: Also note that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> property is case-sensitive; the type name must be matched exactly.
trans-unit.target: Legg også merke som den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>egenskapen skiller; typenavnet må samsvare nøyaktig.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> property for an example.
trans-unit.target: Se den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>egenskapen for et eksempel.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also bind the DataGrid to an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også binde DataGrid til <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>.</xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>

trans-unit.source: A feature of the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> is that it can contain objects of multiple types, but the DataGrid can only bind to such a list when all items in the list are of the same type as the first item.
trans-unit.target: En funksjon i den <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>er at den kan inneholde objekter fra flere typer, men DataGrid kan bare bindes til slik liste når alle elementer i listen er av samme type som det første elementet.</xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>

trans-unit.source: This means that all objects must either be of the same type, or they must inherit from the same class as the first item in the list.
trans-unit.target: Dette betyr at alle objekter må være av samme type eller de må arve fra den samme klassen som det første elementet i listen.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the first item in a list is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>, the second item could be a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> (which inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>).
trans-unit.target: Hvis det første elementet i listen er for eksempel en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>, kan det andre elementet en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>(som arver fra <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>

trans-unit.source: If, on the other hand, the first item is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>, the second object cannot be a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du på den andre siden det første elementet er et <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>det andre objektet kan ikke være en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: Further, the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> must have items in it when it is bound.
trans-unit.target: Flere, den <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>må ha elementer i den når den er bundet.</xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>

trans-unit.source: An empty <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> will result in an empty grid.
trans-unit.target: En tom <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>resulterer i et tomt rutenett.</xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>

trans-unit.source: In addition, the objects in the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> must contain public properties.
trans-unit.target: I tillegg objekter i den <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>må inneholde felles egenskaper.</xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>

trans-unit.source: When binding to an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> to "ArrayList" (the type name).
trans-unit.target: Ved binding til en <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>, angitt i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>til "ArrayList" (typenavn).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> </xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>

trans-unit.source: For each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>, you can set color and caption attributes that override the settings for the DataGrid control.
trans-unit.target: For hver <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>, kan du angi farge og teksten attributter som overstyrer for DataGrid-kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>

trans-unit.source: However, if those properties are not set, the settings for the control are used by default.
trans-unit.target: Hvis disse egenskapene ikke er angitt, brukes innstillingene for kontrollen som standard.

trans-unit.source: The following properties can be overridden by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> properties: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.AllowSorting%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.AlternatingBackColor%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.BackColor%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.ColumnHeadersVisible%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.ForeColor%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.GridLineColor%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.GridLineStyle%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.HeaderBackColor%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.HeaderFont%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.HeaderForeColor%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.LinkColor%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.PreferredColumnWidth%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.PreferredRowHeight%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.ReadOnly%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.RowHeadersVisible%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.RowHeaderWidth%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.SelectionBackColor%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.SelectionForeColor%2A> To customize the appearance of individual columns, add <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>, which is accessed through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.GridColumnStyles%2A> property of each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>.
trans-unit.target: Følgende egenskaper kan overstyres av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>Egenskaper:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.AllowSorting%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.AlternatingBackColor%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.BackColor%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.ColumnHeadersVisible%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.ForeColor%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.GridLineColor%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.GridLineStyle%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.HeaderBackColor%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.HeaderFont%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.HeaderForeColor%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.LinkColor%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.PreferredColumnWidth%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.PreferredRowHeight%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.ReadOnly%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.RowHeadersVisible%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.RowHeaderWidth%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.SelectionBackColor%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.SelectionForeColor%2A>for å tilpasse utseendet til individuelle kolonner, legge til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>objekter til trans-unit.source: To synchronize each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> with a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> in the <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A> to the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A> of a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.
trans-unit.target: Synkronisere hver <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>med et <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>i <xref:System.Data.DataTable>Sett den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A>til den <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A>av en <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: When constructing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>, you can also set a formatting string that specifies how the column displays data.
trans-unit.target: Når en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>, du kan også angi en formatering streng som angir hvordan kolonnen viser data.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify that the column use a short-date format to display dates contained in the table.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel kan du angi at kolonnen bruker korte datoformatet for å vise datoer i tabellen.

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Always create <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects and add them to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> before adding <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Opprett alltid <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>objekter, og Legg dem til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>før du legger til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>objekter til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: When you add an empty <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> with a valid <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> value to the collection, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects are automatically generated for you.
trans-unit.target: Når du legger til en tom <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>med en gyldig <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>verdien i samlingen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>objekter som genereres automatisk for deg.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>

trans-unit.source: Consequently, an exception will be thrown if you try to add new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects with duplicate <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> values to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Derfor vil bli utløst et unntak hvis du prøver å legge til nye <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>objekter med dupliserte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>verdier <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control replaces and adds functionality to the DataGrid control; however, the DataGrid control is retained for both backward compatibility and future use, if you choose.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontrollen erstatter og legger til funksjoner i DataGrid-kontrollen; imidlertid DataGrid-kontrollen er beholdt for bakoverkompatibilitet og fremtidig bruk hvis du velger.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Differences Between the Windows Forms DataGridView and DataGrid Controls](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [forskjeller mellom for Windows Forms DataGridView og DataGrid Kontroller](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: To populate a newly created <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> control, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A> property to a valid source, such as a <xref:System.Data.DataView>, <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, or <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager>.
trans-unit.target: Til å fylle ut et nyopprettede <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>kontrollere, angitt i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>egenskapen til en gyldig datakilde som en <xref:System.Data.DataView>, <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, eller <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager>.</xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> </xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.DataView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether navigation is allowed.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om navigasjon er tillatt.

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `false`, links to child tables are not shown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne egenskapen settes til `false`, koblinger til underordnede tabeller vises ikke.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if navigation is allowed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis navigasjon er tillatt. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AllowNavigation*> property has changed.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AllowNavigation*>egenskapen er endret.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AllowNavigation*>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AllowNavigation%2A> property is set to `false`, then no links to child tables are shown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AllowNavigation%2A>er satt til `false`, og deretter vises ingen koblinger til underordnede tabeller.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AllowNavigation%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the grid can be resorted by clicking on a column header.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om rutenettet kan ordnes ved å klikke på en kolonneoverskrift.

trans-unit.source: This property is overridden by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.AllowSorting%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property if there is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> currently in effect for the control.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen overstyres av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.AllowSorting%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen Hvis det er en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>som gjelder for kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.AllowSorting%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If sorting is allowed, clicking on a column header will sort the table data by that column.
trans-unit.target: Hvis sortering er tillatt, vil å klikke på en kolonneoverskrift sortere tabelldataene etter kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: You can also sort using an expression for a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også sortere ved hjelp av et uttrykk for <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn>

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Expression%2A> for details on creating a sort expression.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Expression%2A>for mer informasjon om hvordan du oppretter et sorteringsuttrykk.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Expression%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> is bound to a <xref:System.Data.DataView>, you can set a custom sort for the table using the <xref:System.Data.DataView> class's <xref:System.Data.DataView.Sort%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>er bundet til en <xref:System.Data.DataView>, kan du angi en egendefinert sortering for tabellen ved hjelp av <xref:System.Data.DataView>klassens <xref:System.Data.DataView.Sort%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Data.DataView.Sort%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataView> </xref:System.Data.DataView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> is bound to a <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager>, each table in the <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> can have a custom sort by setting the <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager.DataViewSettings%2A> class's <xref:System.Data.DataViewSetting.Sort%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: På samme måte hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>er bundet til en <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager>, hver tabell i det <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager>kan ha en egendefinert sortering ved å angi den <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager.DataViewSettings%2A>klassens <xref:System.Data.DataViewSetting.Sort%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Data.DataViewSetting.Sort%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataViewManager.DataViewSettings%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> </xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if columns can be sorted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis kolonnene kan sorteres; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color of odd-numbered rows of the grid.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir bakgrunnsfargen for ulik nummererte radene i rutenettet.

trans-unit.source: By default, both the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackColor%2A> and the AlternatingBackColor properties are set to the same color.
trans-unit.target: Som standard både den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackColor%2A>og AlternatingBackColor-egenskapene er angitt til samme farge.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackColor%2A> property affects only even-numbered rows, while setting the AlternatingBackColor affects only odd-numbered rows.
trans-unit.target: Angivelse av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackColor%2A>påvirker bare engang nummererte rader under angivelse av AlternatingBackColor påvirker ulik nummererte rader.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that represents the alternating background color.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> som representerer vekslende bakgrunnsfargen.

trans-unit.source: The default is the system color for windows (<xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Window*>).
trans-unit.target: Standarden er systemfargen for windows (<xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Window*>).</xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Window*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Back" name="Back" href=""></xref> button on a child table is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref uid="langword_csharp_Back" name="Back" href=""> </xref> -knappen i en underordnet tabell.

trans-unit.source: The `Back` button becomes visible when a child table is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Den `Back` knappen blir synlige når en underordnet tabell vises.

trans-unit.source: Clicking the button will cause the grid to display the parent table.
trans-unit.target: Knappen vil føre til at rutenettet for å vise den overordnede tabellen.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color of even-numbered rows of the grid.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir bakgrunnsfargen for engang nummererte radene i rutenettet.

trans-unit.source: Whereas the BackColor property determines the color of rows in the grid, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundColor%2A> determines the color of the nonrow area, which is only visible when the grid is scrolled to the bottom, or if only a few rows are contained in the grid.
trans-unit.target: Mens egenskapen bakgrunnsfarge bestemmer fargen på radene i rutenettet, den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundColor%2A>bestemmer fargen på området nonrow vises bare når rutenettet er rullet til bunnen, eller hvis det bare finnes noen rader i rutenettet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, both the BackColor and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AlternatingBackColor%2A> properties are set to the same color.
trans-unit.target: Som standard både bakgrunnsfarge og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AlternatingBackColor%2A>egenskapene er angitt til samme farge.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AlternatingBackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting the BackColor property affects only even-numbered rows, while setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AlternatingBackColor%2A> affects only odd-numbered rows.
trans-unit.target: Angir bakgrunnsfargen påvirker bare engang nummererte rader, under angivelse av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AlternatingBackColor%2A>påvirker bare ulik nummererte rader.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AlternatingBackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that represents the color of rows in the grid.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> som representerer fargene som rader i rutenettet.

trans-unit.source: The default is the system color for windows (<xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Window*>).
trans-unit.target: Standarden er systemfargen for windows (<xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Window*>).</xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Window*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of the non-row area of the grid.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir fargen på ikke-radområdet i rutenettet.

trans-unit.source: The BackgroundColor determines the color of the nonrow area of the grid, which is only visible when no table is displayed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>, or if the grid is scrolled to the bottom, or if only a few rows are contained in the grid.
trans-unit.target: BackgroundColor bestemmer fargen på området nonrow i rutenettet, som vises bare når ingen tabellen vises ved den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>, eller hvis rutenettet er rullet til bunnen, eller hvis det bare finnes noen rader i rutenettet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that represents the color of the grid's background.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> som representerer fargen på bakgrunnen i rutenettet.

trans-unit.source: The default is the <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.AppWorkspace*> color.
trans-unit.target: Standard er det <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.AppWorkspace*>farge.</xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.AppWorkspace*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundColor*> has changed.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundColor*>er endret.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundColor*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: This member is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: Dette medlemmet er meningsløst for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The background image associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: Bakgrunnsbilde som er knyttet til kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundImage*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundImage*>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundImage*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundImage%2A> property is not meaningful for this control, although you can change its value and handle the BackgroundImageChanged event to detect the change.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundImage%2A>egenskapen er ikke mening for denne kontrollen, selv om du kan endre verdien og behandle BackgroundImageChanged-hendelsen for å finne endringen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundImage%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: This member is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: Dette medlemmet er meningsløst for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundImageLayout*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundImageLayout*>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundImageLayout*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundImageLayout%2A> property is not meaningful for this control, although you can change its value and handle the BackgroundImageLayoutChanged event to detect the change.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundImageLayout%2A>egenskapen er ikke mening for denne kontrollen, selv om du kan endre verdien og behandle BackgroundImageLayoutChanged-hendelsen for å finne endringen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundImageLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Attempts to put the grid into a state where editing is allowed.
trans-unit.target: Forsøk på å sette rutenettet i en tilstand der redigering er tillatt.

trans-unit.source: The grid will deny edit requests if the user already started typing into a cell.
trans-unit.target: Rutenettet vil nekte redigeringsforespørsler Hvis brukeren allerede er startet å skrive til en celle.

trans-unit.source: In that case, the BeginEdit method will return `false`.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet metoden BeginEdit tilbakestiller `false`.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref> to edit.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref> to edit.

trans-unit.source: The number of the row to edit.
trans-unit.target: Antall raden vil redigere.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the method is successful; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis metoden er fullført. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Begins the initialization of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> that is used on a form or used by another component.
trans-unit.target: Starter initialisering av en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref> som er brukt i et skjema eller brukes av en annen komponent.

trans-unit.source: The initialization occurs at run time.
trans-unit.target: Initialiseringen oppstår under kjøring.

trans-unit.source: The Visual Studio design environment uses this method to start the initialization of a component that is used on a form or used by another component.
trans-unit.target: Utformingsmiljøet i Visual Studio bruker denne metoden til å starte initialisering av en komponent som er brukt i et skjema eller brukes av en annen komponent.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.EndInit%2A> method ends the initialization.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.EndInit%2A>metoden slutter initialiseringen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.EndInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Using the BeginInit and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.EndInit%2A> methods prevents the control from being used before it is fully initialized.
trans-unit.target: Ved hjelp av BeginInit og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.EndInit%2A>metoder hindrer at kontrollen brukes før den er fullstendig initialisert.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.EndInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the grid's border style.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller Angir kantlinjestilen for i rutenettet.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"> </xref> nummereringsverdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_FixedSingle" name="FixedSingle" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_FixedSingle" name="FixedSingle" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BorderStyle*> has changed.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BorderStyle*>er endret.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BorderStyle*>

trans-unit.source: Possible values include `None`, `FixedSingle`, and `Fixed3D`.
trans-unit.target: Mulige verdier inkluderer `None`, `FixedSingle`, og `Fixed3D`.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Cancels the current edit operation and rolls back all changes.
trans-unit.target: Avbryter gjeldende redigeringsoperasjonen og ruller tilbake alle endringer.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color of the caption area.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir bakgrunnsfargen for området teksten.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that represents the caption's background color.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> som representerer den teksten bakgrunnsfarge.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.ActiveCaption*> color.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.ActiveCaption*>farge.</xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.ActiveCaption*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the font of the grid's caption.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir skriften for teksten i rutenettet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Drawing.Font> encapsulates a Windows font and provides the methods for manipulating that font.

trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> som representerer den skrift.

trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir forgrunnsfargen på teksten.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text of the grid's window caption.

trans-unit.target: En streng som skal vises som tittelen vinduet i rutenettet.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the grid's caption is visible.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om teksten i rutenettet er synlig.

trans-unit.source: If CaptionVisible is `false`, the **Back** button, **ParentRow** button, and caption will not be seen.
trans-unit.target: Hvis CaptionVisible `false`, **tilbake** -knappen, **ParentRow** knappen og teksten vil ikke være synlige.

trans-unit.source: Because navigation is limited, links to child tables will also not be visible and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AllowNavigation%2A> will be set to `None`.
trans-unit.target: Siden navigasjon er begrenset, koblinger til underordnede tabeller også blir ikke synlig og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AllowNavigation%2A>settes til `None`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AllowNavigation%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the caption is visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis teksten er synlige. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Collapses child relations, if any exist for all rows, or for a specified row.
trans-unit.target: Skjuler underordnede relasjoner Hvis noen finnes for alle rader, eller for en bestemt rad.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.IsExpanded%2A> method to determine if a row is expanded.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.IsExpanded%2A>metode for å fastslå om en rad er utvidet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.IsExpanded%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of the row to collapse.
trans-unit.target: Antall raden skal skjules.

trans-unit.source: If set to -1, all rows are collapsed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis satt til -1, alle rader er skjult.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the column headers of a table are visible.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om kolonneoverskriftene i en tabell er synlig.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the column headers are visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Informs the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> control when the user begins to edit the column at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: Informerer den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref> kontrollerer når brukeren starter til å redigere kolonne på den angitte plasseringen.

trans-unit.source: When called, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridColumnStyleEditingNotificationService.ColumnStartedEditing%2A> method enables the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> control to show a pencil in the row header.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridColumnStyleEditingNotificationService.ColumnStartedEditing%2A>metoden aktiverer den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>kontrollen skal vises en liggende i rad-overskrift.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridColumnStyleEditingNotificationService.ColumnStartedEditing%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that defines the location of the edited column.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som definerer plasseringen for den redigerte kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: Informs the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> control when the user begins to edit a column using the specified control.
trans-unit.target: Informerer den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref> kontrollerer når brukeren begynner å redigere en kolonne ved hjelp av den angitte kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: When called, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridColumnStyleEditingNotificationService.ColumnStartedEditing%2A> method enables the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> control to show a pencil in the row header.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridColumnStyleEditingNotificationService.ColumnStartedEditing%2A>metoden aktiverer den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>kontrollen skal vises en liggende i rad-overskrift.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridColumnStyleEditingNotificationService.ColumnStartedEditing%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> used to edit the column.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> brukes til å redigere kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new instance of the accessibility object for this control.
trans-unit.target: Bygger en ny forekomst av tilgjengelighet-objekt for denne kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Derived classes should not call the base class's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Avledede klasser kan ikke kalle basisklassen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A>metode.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A>

trans-unit.source: Only the following properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> should be set: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Role%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Description%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Name%2A> All other properties are handled by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> itself.
trans-unit.target: Bare følgende egenskaper for det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>må angis:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Role%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Description%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Name%2A>alle andre egenskaper behandles av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>seg selv.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Description%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Role%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>

trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject>for kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject>

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Angi stilen kolonnen som standard. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
