trans-unit.target: The new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets which cell has the focus.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir hvilken celle har fokus.

trans-unit.source: Not available at design time.
trans-unit.target: Ikke tilgjengelig under utformingen.

trans-unit.source: Setting the CurrentCell property will cause the grid to scroll and show the cell if it is not already visible.
trans-unit.target: Angi egenskapen CurrentCell vil føre til at rutenettet for å rulle og vise cellen hvis det ikke er synlig.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell"></xref> with the focus.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell"> </xref> med fokus.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell*> property has changed.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell*>egenskapen er endret.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell*>

trans-unit.source: To determine the current cell, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Bruk til å fastslå gjeldende celle i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets index of the row that currently has focus.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir indeksen i raden som har fokus.

trans-unit.source: Setting the CurrentRowIndex property to a value other than its current value scrolls the control so that the specified row is in view.
trans-unit.target: Angi egenskapen CurrentRowIndex til en annen verdi enn den gjeldende verdien ruller kontrollen slik at den angitte raden finnes i visningen.

trans-unit.source: The CurrentRowIndex property enables you to iterate through a parent table's rows even if you are viewing the child table rows.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen CurrentRowIndex kan du gå gjennom en overordnet tabell rader selv om du viser tabellradene underordnede.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you are viewing a child table, incrementing the CurrentRowIndex will cause the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> to display the next set of records in the child table that are linked to the parent table.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis du viser en underordnet tabell, intervaller i CurrentRowIndex vil føre til at den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>til å vise den neste poster i den underordnede tabellen som er koblet til den overordnede tabellen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the user is viewing a parent table, or a table with no child relations, then the property returns the zero-based index of the current row.
trans-unit.target: Hvis brukeren er viser en overordnet tabell eller en tabell med ingen underordnede-relasjoner, returnerer den nullbaserte indeksen for den gjeldende raden i egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the current row.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen for den gjeldende raden.

trans-unit.source: There is no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Det er ingen <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This member is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: Dette medlemmet er meningsløst for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The type of cursor to display as the mouse pointer moves over the object.
trans-unit.target: Hva slags markøren skal vises som musepekeren flyttes over objektet.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.Cursor*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.Cursor*>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.Cursor*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.Cursor%2A> property is not meaningful for this control, although you can change its value and handle the CursorChanged event to detect the change.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.Cursor%2A>egenskapen er ikke mening for denne kontrollen, selv om du kan endre verdien og behandle CursorChanged-hendelsen for å finne endringen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.Cursor%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the specific list in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource*> for which the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> control displays a grid.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en spesifikk liste i en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource*>som den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref> kontrollen viser et rutenett.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource*>

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A> contains multiple sources of data, you should set the DataMember to one of the sources.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>inneholder flere kilder med data, må du angi DataMember til blant kildene.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A> is a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> or <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> that contains three tables named `Customers`, `Orders`, and `OrderDetails`, you must specify one of the tables to bind to.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>er en <xref:System.Data.DataSet>eller <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager>som inneholder tre tabeller som heter `Customers`, `Orders`, og `OrderDetails`, må du angi én av tabellene som skal bindes til.</xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> </xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> or <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> contains only one <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, you should set the DataMember to the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> of that <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Data.DataSet>eller <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager>inneholder bare én <xref:System.Data.DataTable>bør du sette DataMember til den <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A>av som <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> </xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A> is set to a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> that contains <xref:System.Data.DataRelation> objects, parent tables will appear with a plus sign (+) in each row header.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>er satt til en <xref:System.Data.DataSet>som inneholder <xref:System.Data.DataRelation>objekter overordnede tabeller vises med plusstegnet (+) i hver rad-overskrift.</xref:System.Data.DataRelation> </xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: Clicking the plus sign causes a node to appear that contains links to child tables.
trans-unit.target: Når du klikker plusstegnet fører til en node skal vises som inneholder koblinger til underordnede tabeller.

trans-unit.source: For example, if a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> contains two <xref:System.Data.DataTable> objects named `Customers` and `Orders`, setting the DataMember to the `Customers` table causes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> to display a parent table with a plus sign visible on each row header.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis en <xref:System.Data.DataSet>inneholder to <xref:System.Data.DataTable>objekter med navnet `Customers` og `Orders`, hvis DataMember til den `Customers` tabell årsaker den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>til å vise en overordnet tabell med en plusstegnet vises på hver radoverskrift.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: If the DataMember is set to `Orders`, however, the row headers will be blank.
trans-unit.target: Hvis DataMember er satt til `Orders`, men radoverskriftene er tomt.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A> is a <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, <xref:System.Data.DataView>, collection, or array, setting the DataMember property throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>er en <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, <xref:System.Data.DataView>, samlingen eller matrise, angir egenskapen DataMember oppstår det et unntak.</xref:System.Data.DataView> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > At run time, you must use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.SetDataBinding%2A> method to reset the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Ved kjøretid, må du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.SetDataBinding%2A>metode for å tilbakestille den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.SetDataBinding%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, the DataMember property alone can be reset at any time to a valid table name.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen DataMember alene kan imidlertid tilbakestilles når som helst til et gyldig navn.

trans-unit.source: A list in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource*>.
trans-unit.target: En liste med <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource*>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource*>

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng ("").

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data source that the grid is displaying data for.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir datakilden som rutenettet viser dataene for.

trans-unit.source: At run time, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.SetDataBinding%2A> method to set the DataSource and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Ved kjøretid, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.SetDataBinding%2A>metode for å angi datakilden og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.SetDataBinding%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following data sources are valid: - A <xref:System.Data.DataTable> - A <xref:System.Data.DataView> - A <xref:System.Data.DataSet> - A <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> - Any component that implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> interface - Any component that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> class overview for more information on data sources.
trans-unit.target: For følgende datakilder er gyldige: – en <xref:System.Data.DataTable>– en <xref:System.Data.DataView>– en <xref:System.Data.DataSet>– en <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager>-komponent som implementerer den <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>interface - komponent som implementerer den <xref:System.Collections.IList>grensesnitt se den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>Oversikt over klasse for mer informasjon om datakilder.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> </xref:System.Collections.IList> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> </xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> </xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.DataView> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: If the DataSource reference contains more than one table, you must set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A> property a string that specifies the table to bind to.
trans-unit.target: Hvis referansen for datakilde inneholder flere tabeller, må du angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A>egenskapen en streng som angir tabellen skal bindes til.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the DataSource is a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> or <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> that contains three tables named `Customers`, `Orders`, and `OrderDetails`, you must specify the table to bind to.
trans-unit.target: Hvis datakilden er for eksempel en <xref:System.Data.DataSet>eller <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager>som inneholder tre tabeller som heter `Customers`, `Orders`, og `OrderDetails`, må du angi tabellen skal bindes til.</xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> </xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: Setting the DataSource to an object that does not implement the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface or an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> will cause the grid to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Angir datakilden til et objekt som implementerer ikke det <xref:System.Collections.IList>grensesnittet eller en <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>vil føre til at rutenettet for å iverksette et unntak.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> </xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: You can create a grid that enables users to edit data but prevents them from adding new rows by using a <xref:System.Data.DataView> as the data source and setting the <xref:System.Data.DataView.AddNew%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Du kan opprette et rutenett som gjør at brukere redigerer data, men ikke kan legges til nye rader ved hjelp av en <xref:System.Data.DataView>som datakilde og innstillingen det <xref:System.Data.DataView.AddNew%2A>egenskapen `false`.</xref:System.Data.DataView.AddNew%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataView>

trans-unit.source: To bind the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> to a strongly typed array of objects, the object type must contain public properties.
trans-unit.target: Å binde den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>objekttypen må inneholde offentlige egenskapene til en forespørselsparameter av sterk type matrise av objekter.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: To create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> that displays the array, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `typename` where `typename` is replaced by the name of the object type.
trans-unit.target: Opprette en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>som viser matrisen må du angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen `typename` der `typename` erstattes med navnet objekttypen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>

trans-unit.source: Also note that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> property is case-sensitive; the type name must be matched exactly.
trans-unit.target: Legg også merke som den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>egenskapen skiller; typenavnet må samsvare nøyaktig.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> property for an example.
trans-unit.target: Se den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>egenskapen for et eksempel.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also bind the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> to an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også binde den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>til en <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>.</xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: A feature of the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> is that it can contain objects of multiple types, but the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> can only bind to such a list when all items in the list are of the same type as the first item.
trans-unit.target: En funksjon i den <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>er at den kan inneholde objekter fra flere typer, men <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>kan bare bindes til slik liste når alle elementer i listen er av samme type som det første elementet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> </xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>

trans-unit.source: This means that all objects must either be of the same type, or they must inherit from the same class as the first item in the list.
trans-unit.target: Dette betyr at alle objekter må være av samme type eller de må arve fra den samme klassen som det første elementet i listen.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the first item in a list is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>, the second item could be a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> (which inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>).
trans-unit.target: Hvis det første elementet i listen er for eksempel en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>, kan det andre elementet en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>(som arver fra <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>

trans-unit.source: If, on the other hand, the first item is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>, the second object cannot be a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du på den andre siden det første elementet er et <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>det andre objektet kan ikke være en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: Further, the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> must have items in it when it is bound.
trans-unit.target: Flere, den <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>må ha elementer i den når den er bundet.</xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>

trans-unit.source: An empty <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> will result in an empty grid.
trans-unit.target: En tom <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>resulterer i et tomt rutenett.</xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>

trans-unit.source: In addition, the objects in the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> must contain public properties.
trans-unit.target: I tillegg objekter i den <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>må inneholde felles egenskaper.</xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>

trans-unit.source: When binding to an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> to "ArrayList" (the type name).
trans-unit.target: Ved binding til en <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>, angitt i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>til "ArrayList" (typenavn).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> </xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>

trans-unit.source: An object that functions as a data source.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som fungerer som en datakilde.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource*> property value has changed.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource*>egenskapsverdien er endret.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource*>

trans-unit.source: The DataSourceChanged event occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A> value changes, or when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> changes.
trans-unit.target: DataSourceChanged hendelsen oppstår når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A>verdi endres, eller når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>endringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets the default size of the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter standardstørrelsen på kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default size of the control.
trans-unit.target: Standardstørrelsen på kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Disposes of the resources (other than memory) used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Disposes av ressursene (enn minnet) som brukes av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Kall avhending når du er ferdig med <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Fjerningsmetoden forlater den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>i en ubrukelig tilstand.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> so the memory it was occupying can be reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Etter å avhending, må du frigi alle referanser til den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>Slik minne den ble bruker kan gode av datasanering.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>å frigjøre både administrerte og uforvaltede ressurser. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> frigi bare uforvaltede ressurser.

trans-unit.source: Requests an end to an edit operation taking place on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Ber om en avslutning til en Rediger operasjonen tar sted på den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The EndEdit method returns `false` if the user is not editing (typing into) a cell.
trans-unit.target: Metoden EndEdit returnerer `false` Hvis brukeren ikke redigerer (å skrive inn i) en celle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref> to cease editing.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"> </xref> slutter redigering.

trans-unit.source: The number of the row to cease editing.
trans-unit.target: Antall raden slutter redigering.

trans-unit.source: Set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current operation should be stopped.
trans-unit.target: Satt til <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> hvis den gjeldende operasjonen skal stoppes.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the editing operation ceases; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis det ikke lenger redigeringsoperasjonen; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Ends the initialization of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> that is used on a form or used by another component.
trans-unit.target: Slutter initialisering av en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref> som er brukt i et skjema eller brukes av en annen komponent.

trans-unit.source: The initialization occurs at run time.
trans-unit.target: Initialiseringen oppstår under kjøring.

trans-unit.source: The Visual Studio design environment uses this method to end the initialization of a component that is used on a form or used by another component.
trans-unit.target: Utformingsmiljøet i Visual Studio bruker denne metoden avsluttes initialisering av en komponent som er brukt i et skjema eller brukes av en annen komponent.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BeginInit%2A> method starts the initialization.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BeginInit%2A>metoden starter initialiseringen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BeginInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BeginInit%2A> and EndInit methods prevents the control from being used before it is fully initialized.
trans-unit.target: Ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BeginInit%2A>og EndInit metoder hindrer at kontrollen brukes før den er fullstendig initialisert.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BeginInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Displays child relations, if any exist, for all rows or a specific row.
trans-unit.target: Viser underordnede relasjoner Hvis noen finnes, for alle rader eller en bestemt rad.

trans-unit.source: The number of the row to expand.
trans-unit.target: Antall raden skal utvides.

trans-unit.source: If set to -1, all rows are expanded.
trans-unit.target: Hvis satt til -1, alle radene vises.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the first visible column in a grid.
trans-unit.target: Henter indeksen for den første synlige kolonnen i et rutenett.

trans-unit.source: A column is considered visible even if it is partially concealed.
trans-unit.target: En kolonne anses synlige, selv om den delvis er skjult.

trans-unit.source: If a particular column is not visible, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> property to the cell that should be visible.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en bestemt kolonne ikke er synlig, kan du angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A>egenskapen til cellen som skal være synlig.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for et <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the grid displays in flat mode.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om rutenettet vises i flat modus.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the grid is displayed flat; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis rutenettet vises flate; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.FlatMode*> has changed.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.FlatMode*>er endret.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.FlatMode*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir egenskapen forgrunnen farge (vanligvis fargen på teksten) for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that represents the foreground color.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> som representerer fargene som forgrunnen.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.WindowText*> color.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.WindowText*>farge.</xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.WindowText*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> of the cell specified by <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> i cellen som er angitt av <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell"></xref> to look up.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell"> </xref> til å slå opp.

trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som definerer den gjeldende cellen hjørne.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> of the cell specified by row and column number.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> i cellen som er angitt av rad- og tall.

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the cell bounds for the currently selected cell, use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.GetCurrentCellBounds%2A>.
trans-unit.target: For å hente celle grensene for den valgte cellen, kan du bruke <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.GetCurrentCellBounds%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.GetCurrentCellBounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of the cell's row.
trans-unit.target: Antall i celle rad.

trans-unit.source: The number of the cell's column.
trans-unit.target: Antall i celle kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that defines the current cell's corners.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som definerer den gjeldende cellen hjørne.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that specifies the four corners of the selected cell.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som angir fire hjørne i den valgte cellen.

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the cell bounds for a cell other than the current cell, use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.GetCellBounds%2A>.
trans-unit.target: For å hente celle-område for en annen celle enn gjeldende celle, kan du bruke <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.GetCellBounds%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.GetCellBounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that defines the current cell's corners.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som definerer den gjeldende cellen hjørne.

trans-unit.source: Gets the string that is the delimiter between columns when row contents are copied to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: Henter strengen som skilletegn mellom kolonner når rad innholdet er kopiert til utklippstavlen.

trans-unit.source: The string value "\t", which represents a tab used to separate columns in a row.
trans-unit.target: Strengverdien "\t", som representerer en kategori som brukes til å skille kolonner i en rad.

trans-unit.source: Listens for the scroll event of the horizontal scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: Lytter for hendelsen rullefeltet på det vannrette rullefeltet.

trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>som inneholder data om kontroll.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder hendelsesdataene.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of the grid lines.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir fargen på rutenettlinjene.

trans-unit.source: No grid line is displayed if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.GridLineStyle%2A> property is set to `DataGridLineStyle.None`.
trans-unit.target: Ingen rutenett vises hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.GridLineStyle%2A>er satt til `DataGridLineStyle.None`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.GridLineStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that represents the color of the grid lines.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> som representerer fargen på rutenettlinjene.

trans-unit.source: The default is the system color for controls (<xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Control*>).
trans-unit.target: Standarden er systemfargen for kontroller (<xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Control*>).</xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Control*>

trans-unit.source: The value is not set.
trans-unit.target: Verdien er ikke angitt.

trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir linjestilen for rutenettet.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridLineStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridLineStyle"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Solid" name="Solid" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_Solid" name="Solid" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Listens for the scroll event of the vertical scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: Lytter for hendelsen rullefeltet for det loddrette rullefeltet.

trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>som inneholder data om kontroll.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder hendelsesdataene.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color of all row and column headers.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir bakgrunnsfargen for alle rad- og kolonneoverskrifter.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that represents the background color of row and column headers.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> som representerer bakgrunnsfargen for rad- og kolonneoverskrifter.

trans-unit.source: The default is the system color for controls, <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Control*>.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er systemfargen for kontroller <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Control*>.</xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Control*>

trans-unit.source: While trying to set the property, a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Color.Empty" name="Color.Empty" href=""></xref> was passed.
trans-unit.target: Under forsøk på å angi egenskapen en <xref uid="langword_csharp_Color.Empty" name="Color.Empty" href=""> </xref> ble sendt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the font used for column headers.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir skriften som brukes for kolonneoverskrifter.

trans-unit.source: You typically use this method only if you are either creating a designer for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>, or creating your own control incorporating the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Du vanligvis bruker denne metoden hvis du enten oppretter en utformer for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>, eller opprette din egen kontroll implementert <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> that represents the header text.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> som representerer toppteksten.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the foreground color of headers.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir forgrunnsfargen på overskrifter.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that represents the foreground color of the grid's column headers, including the column header text and the plus/minus glyphs.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> som representerer fargene som forgrunnen av kolonneoverskriftene i rutenettet, inkludert kolonne toppteksten og pluss/minus symboler.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.ControlText*> color.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.ControlText*>farge.</xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.ControlText*>

trans-unit.source: Gets information, such as row and column number of a clicked point on the grid, about the grid using a specific <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter informasjon, for eksempel rad- og antall en klikket punktet i rutenettet om rutenettet ved hjelp av en bestemt <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestInfo>, in conjunction with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTest%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> control, is used to determine which part of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> control the user has clicked.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestInfo>, sammen med den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTest%2A>metoden for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>styre, brukes til å finne ut hvilken del av en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>kontrollen brukeren har trykket.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTest%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestInfo>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestInfo> contains the row, column, and part of the grid that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestInfo>inneholder rad-, kolonne- og en del av rutenettet som ble klikket.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestInfo>

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestInfo.Type%2A> property returns a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestType> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: I tillegg av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestInfo.Type%2A>returnerer en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestType>opplisting.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestInfo.Type%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTest%2A> method takes an x and y argument supplied by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseWheel> events.

trans-unit.source: Set this property before resetting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A> properties (either separately, or through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.SetDataBinding%2A> method), or the property will have no effect.
trans-unit.target: Angi denne egenskapen før den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A>Egenskaper (enten separat, eller til den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.SetDataBinding%2A>metoden), eller egenskapen har ingen virkning.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.SetDataBinding%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The property cannot be set to a value less than 0.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen kan ikke angis til en verdi mindre enn 0.

trans-unit.source: The default width (in pixels) of columns in the grid.
trans-unit.target: Standardbredden (i piksler) for kolonnene i rutenettet.

trans-unit.source: The property value is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapsverdien er mindre enn 0.

trans-unit.source: Set this property before resetting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A> properties (either separately, or through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.SetDataBinding%2A> method), or the property will have no effect.

trans-unit.target: Høyden på en rad.

trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om en nøkkel skal behandles videre.

trans-unit.source: The method overrides the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogKey%2A> method to implement keyboard navigation of the grid.
trans-unit.target: Metoden overstyrer den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogKey%2A>metode for å implementere tastatur navigering i rutenettet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogKey%2A>

trans-unit.target: Behandler nøkler for rutenett navigasjon.

trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder data om nøkkelen opp eller key hendelse.

trans-unit.source: Previews a keyboard message and returns a value indicating if the key was consumed.
trans-unit.target: Viser feilmeldingen tastatur og returnerer en verdi som angir om nøkkelen ble brukt.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by a child control when the child control receives a keyboard message.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles av en underordnet kontroll når den underordnede kontrollen mottar en tastatur-melding.

trans-unit.source: The child control calls this method before generating any keyboard events for the message.
trans-unit.target: Den underordnede kontrollen kaller opp denne metoden før genereres tastaturhendelser for meldingen.

trans-unit.source: If this method returns `true`, the child control considers the message consumed and does not generate any keyboard events.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne metoden returnerer `true`, den underordnede kontrollen anser meldingen forbrukes og genererer ikke tastaturhendelser.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref> that contains data about the event.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref> som inneholder data om hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The parameter is passed by reference.
trans-unit.target: Parameteren sendes som referanse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the grid is in read-only mode.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om rutenettet er i skrivebeskyttet modus.

trans-unit.source: In read-only mode, the grid can be scrolled, nodes can be expanded or collapsed, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Rutenettet kan rulles i skrivebeskyttet modus, noder kan vises eller skjules, og så videre.

trans-unit.source: However, no additions, edits, or deletes can take place.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid kan ikke legge til, redigere eller sletter utføres.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> also has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.ReadOnly%2A> property that can be set to true to prevent data from being edited, on a column-by-column basis.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>også er en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.ReadOnly%2A>egenskapen kan settes til SANN for å forhindre at data som redigeres, på en kolonne for kolonne-basis.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.ReadOnly%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: The ReadOnly can be set to true if you want to prohibit the user from editing the data directly in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: ReadOnly kan bare settes til SANN hvis du vil forby brukeren å redigere dataene direkte i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For example, you might want to let users to see all columns in a table, but allow them to edit specific fields only through <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controls on a different form.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel at brukere for å se alle kolonnene i en tabell, men la dem til å redigere bestemte felt bare gjennom <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>i et annet skjema.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the grid is in read-only mode; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis rutenettet er i skrivebeskyttet modus. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> of the grid table object to the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> of the <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: Angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>i rutenettet tabellobjekt til den <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A>av <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Add <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects, one for each grid column you want to show, to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.GridColumnStyles%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Legg til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>objekter, én for hver rutenettkolonne som skal vises til den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>returnert av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.GridColumnStyles%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.GridColumnStyles%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A> of each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> to the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A> of a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.
trans-unit.target: Sett den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A>til hver <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>til den <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A>av en <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Add the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> object to the collection returned by TableStyles property.
trans-unit.target: Legg til det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>objektet i samlingen som returneres av TableStyles.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Always create <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects and add them to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> before adding <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Opprett alltid <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>objekter, og Legg dem til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>før du legger til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>objekter til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: When you add an empty <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> with a valid <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> value to the collection, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects are automatically generated for you.
trans-unit.target: Når du legger til en tom <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>med en gyldig <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>verdien i samlingen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>objekter som genereres automatisk for deg.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>

trans-unit.source: Consequently, an exception will be thrown if you try to add new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects with duplicate <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> values to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Derfor vil bli utløst et unntak hvis du prøver å legge til nye <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>objekter med dupliserte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>verdier <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection"></xref> that represents the collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection"> </xref> som representerer samlingen av <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle"> </xref> objekter.

trans-unit.source: This member is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: Dette medlemmet er meningsløst for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The text associated with this control.
trans-unit.target: Teksten som er forbundet med denne kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.Text*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.Text*>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.Text*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.Text%2A> property is not meaningful for this control, although you can change its value and handle the TextChanged event to detect the change.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.Text%2A>egenskapen er ikke mening for denne kontrollen, selv om du kan endre verdien og behandler TextChanged-hendelsen for å finne endringen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Unselects a specified row.
trans-unit.target: Opphever merkingen av en bestemt rad.

trans-unit.source: Use this method with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.IsSelected%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.Select%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.ResetSelection%2A> methods to manipulate the selection state of a particular row.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne metoden med den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.IsSelected%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.Select%2A>, og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.ResetSelection%2A>metoder for å endre utvalgstilstanden for en bestemt rad.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.ResetSelection%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.Select%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.IsSelected%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the row to deselect.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen i raden å oppheve.

trans-unit.source: Gets the vertical scroll bar of the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter det loddrette rullefeltet for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar"></xref> of the grid.
trans-unit.target: Loddrett <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar"> </xref> i rutenettet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of visible columns.
trans-unit.target: Henter antallet synlige kolonner.

trans-unit.source: The number of visible columns can change depending on their width.
trans-unit.target: Antallet synlige kolonner kan endre avhengig av bredden.

trans-unit.source: For example, if a default width for all columns is set, but the width of a new column is set twice as large, the number of visible columns can be reduced by at least one.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en standardbredden for alle kolonner er angitt, men bredden på en ny kolonne som er angitt to ganger som store, kan for eksempel antall synlige kolonner reduseres med minst én.

trans-unit.source: The number of columns visible in the viewport.
trans-unit.target: Antall kolonner vises i VISNINGSPORTEN.

trans-unit.source: The viewport is the rectangular area through which the grid is visible.
trans-unit.target: VISNINGSPORTEN er rektangulært område som rutenettet er synlig.

trans-unit.source: The size of the viewport depends on the size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> control; if you allow users to resize the control, the viewport will also be affected.
trans-unit.target: Størrelsen på VISNINGSPORTEN er avhengig av størrelsen på den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref> kontrollere; Hvis du tillater brukere å endre kontrollen, påvirkes også VISNINGSPORTEN.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of rows visible.
trans-unit.target: Henter antall rader som vises.

trans-unit.source: The number of visible rows can be changed at run time if the user is allowed to resize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> control.
trans-unit.target: Antallet synlige rader kan endres ved kjøretid om brukeren kan endre den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The number of rows visible in the viewport.
trans-unit.target: Antall rader som vises i VISNINGSPORTEN.

trans-unit.source: The viewport is the rectangular area through which the grid is visible.
trans-unit.target: VISNINGSPORTEN er rektangulært område som rutenettet er synlig.

trans-unit.source: The size of the viewport depends on the size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> control; if you allow users to resize the control, the viewport will also be affected.
trans-unit.target: Størrelsen på VISNINGSPORTEN er avhengig av størrelsen på den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref> kontrollere; Hvis du tillater brukere å endre kontrollen, påvirkes også VISNINGSPORTEN.
